name: Spiral Snowman Cookies
author: Anonymous
summary: Ropes of cookie dough coil up to make these tasty snowmen-simple child's play.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound 1.5 ounce) pouch Betty Crocker® sugar cookie mix
⅓ cup butter or margarine, softened
¼ cup Coarse white decorating sugar
¼ cup Miniature semisweet chocolate chips
1 (.68 oz. tube) Betty Crocker® black decorating gel
¼ cup Betty Crocker® Whipped frosting (any flavor)
directions: In medium bowl, stir cookie mix, flour, butter and egg until soft dough forms
On lightly floured surface, place heaping tablespoon of dough; roll dough into a 10-inch rope
On ungreased cookie sheet, loosely coil 1 end of rope into circle to make head
Loosely coil other end of rope in opposite direction for body
Repeat with remaining dough, placing cookies about 2 inches apart
Sprinkle each cookie with coarse sugar
Add cinnamon candies for buttons, multicolored candies for nose and chocolate chips for eyes
Bake 7 to 9 minutes or until light golden brown
Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheet to cooling rack
For each hat, on surface sprinkled with sugar, flatten gumdrop into hat shape; attach to head of snowman with small amount of frosting
